ValidationRule.description: Solution Provided date has to be less than or equal to closed date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(($Setup.CH_CaseStatus_Validation_Bypass__c.CH_Disable_Validation_Rules__c = false), AND(CH_RecordTypeCheck__c, CH_IsCompleteSolutionProvided__c, NOT(ISNULL(CH_SolutionProvided__c )), CH_SolutionProvided__c > ClosedDate))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Solution Provided date has to be less than or equal to closed date
